font.span:
This lesson discusses [insert].
During the lesson, we will help you to apply your knowledge by asking you questions about scenarios. These questions will not be scored. Please read each scenario carefully and keep it in mind as you work through the lesson. Use the feedback provide to consolidate what you have learned during this lesson.

These questions are not scored and your response is not recorded. Use the feedback provided to consolidate what you have learned during this lesson.
Click on the Quick Facts menu button above to view a summary of points covered in the lesson.
To get started, click on the Next button below on the right, or select a topic from the Table of Contents. You can return to this page at any time by clicking on the Home menu button above.
Click on the Quick Facts menu button above for a summary of points covered in the lesson.
To complete your Quiz for this lesson, first click on the Exit menu button above to exit the lesson and return to your Salt™ home page. From there, you can select the Quiz you wish to complete.

Text.div: Congratulations! You have completed your lesson.
Click the End Lesson button below to exit the lesson
